import React, {Component} from 'react'; import './product-item.component.scss' import clickMe from '../img/arrow_click_me.png' import sparks from '../img/sparks.png' const Product = ({name,price,color,img,order,id,width, link}) => ( <>

{name.toUpperCase()}

{price}

{/*

Click picture

*/}
) class _Product extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { hovered: false } } } export default Product;
